profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Wednesday March 27, 2019 at 00:36

langmaterial.language: Materials chiefly in English, German, French, and Italian.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to researchers by appointment. There are no restricted materials in the collection. Please contact the Special Collections staff to schedule an appointment.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The collection is the physical property of the Irving S. Gilmore Music Library of Yale University. Copyrights belong to the composers and authors, or their legal heirs and assigns.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Misc. Ms. 302, The Libretto Collection in the Irving S. Gilmore Music Library of Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of published librettos for operas, many of them associated with performances in New York or other cities.

did.unittitle: Don Gil von den grünen Hosen
Ero e Leandro / Hero and Leander
The Marriage of Jeannette (bound with Delibe's Sylvia)
